name: L.F. de Nauw
seeking: L.F. de Nauw at Practice the Now seeks JV partners who serve overlapping mindfulness or wellness audiences and can co-promote meditation and present-moment awareness programs. Partnerships with yoga instructors, mental health coaches, or wellness retreat operators would allow cross-referral of clients already open to contemplative practices. Summit participations or bundle collaborations with other mindfulness educators would be a natural fit.
who_you_serve: Mindfulness seekers and individuals wanting present-moment awareness and meditation practices.
what_you_do: Run Practice the Now mindfulness programs.
offering: Mindfulness and present-moment awareness programs and meditation practices (Practice the Now)
business_focus: Run Practice the Now mindfulness programs.
